# Program to compute and print the lower of two numbers

# Ask the user to enter two numbers
num1 = int(input("Please enter the first number: "))
num2 = int(input("Please enter the second number: "))

# Compute the lower of the two numbers
lower_num = min(num1, num2)

# Print the lower number
print("The lower of the two numbers is:", lower_num)
